author: Screen Junkies
description:
It's time for the Honest Trailer for The Thing (1982)! We love this movie, and if you don't, you might be a shapeshifting alien. It's got everything: Kurt Russell, John Carpenter, flamethrowers, autopsies gone wrong, killer sled dogs, guys being dudes, aliens being guys, and an ending so ambiguous, we're STILL debating who's who and what's what. Throw it on on a cold night and thank us later, just make sure you're not watching the remake...

Voice Narration: Jon Bailey the EPIC VOICE GUY (@epicvoiceguy on all socials)
Title Design: Robert Holtby
Written by: Spencer Gilbert and Lon Harris
Produced by: Spencer Gilbert
Edited by: Kevin Williamsen
Post-Production Manager: Emin Bassavand
Manager, Video Operations: Tiffany Tse
Post-Production Specialist: Rebecca Castaneda
VP Content: Max Dionne

#honesttrailers #entertainment #parody #trailer #thething #johncarpenter
title: Honest Trailers | The Thing
